title: Lions vs Australia LIVE: First Test reaction, quotes, scorers, lineups, stats & updates
description: Follow live text commentary & score updates as the British and Irish Lions take on Australia in the first test at Suncorp Stadium, Brisbane.
content:
'For a lot of this game it did not feel like a Lions test match' FT: Australia 19-27 Lions
Chris Jones
BBC rugby union correspondent at Suncorp Stadium

title: Syrian presidency declares ‘comprehensive’ ceasefire in Sweida after deadly clashes
description: Presidency urges all parties to commit to truce and says any breaches will be violation of sovereignty
content: The Syrian presidency has declared an “immediate and comprehensive” ceasefire in Sweida, saying internal security forces had been deployed in the southern province after almost a week of fighting in the predominantly Druze area which has killed more ... [6906 chars]

title: Several critically injured after vehicle 'driven into crowd' in Los Angeles
description: Up to five people are in a critical condition after a vehicle is reported to have driven into a crowd in Los Angeles.
content:
Up to five people are in a critical condition after a vehicle is reported to have driven into a crowd in Los Angeles.

title: Gaza: More than 30 people killed 'as Israeli troops open fire towards Palestinians waiting for aid'
description: The deaths occurred in two incidents near distribution hubs operated by the US-Israeli-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation (GHF).
content:
More than 30 people have been killed after Israeli troops opened fire towards crowds of Palestinians waiting for aid, according to witnesses and hospital officials.
